product_name: Sierra Designs Vapor Light 1 Tent - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built to keep you comfortable on your solo backpacking adventures, the Sierra Designs Vapor Light 1 tent is easy to pitch and features tall walls for lots of headroom, and a vestibule for extra gear. Minimum trail weight of 2 lbs. 14 oz. makes the tent easy to carry on short backpacking trips. DAC NSL aluminum poles are lightweight and strong, pole configuration creates steep, high walls without adding extra weight. DAC Jake's Feet at tent corners allow easy attachment of poles, fly and footprint (sold separately) and offer a secure connection; release them with a simple twist. Mesh walls and vestibule vent allow air to circulate, preventing interior condensation. Seams feature PVC-free tape to ensure watertight seals. Reflective door trim and guyouts help ease nighttime visibility. Gear pockets keep gear organized and off the floor. Closeout.
short_description: Built to keep you comfortable on your solo backpacking adventures, the Sierra Designs Vapor Light 1 tent is easy to pitch and features tall walls for lots of headroom, and a vestibule for extra gear.
